question: Who laid Foundation Stone Of Navi Mumbai Airport recently?
explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi laid the foundation stone of the Navi Mumbai International Airport site in Panvel, nearly 21 years after it was mooted. The first phase the Rs 16,700-crore project is expected to be completed by 2019. This is the country's largest greenfield airport. Navi Mumbai airport will have a capacity of handling 60 million passengers.
